instructions: Open the Google Play app on your phone or tablet. Tap on the menu (3 lines) in the top left corner. Tap on Subscriptions . Google Play App 1 Google Play App 2 Source: Jeramy Johnson / Android Central Tap on the subscription that you wish to cancel. Tap Cancel . Google Play App 3 Google Play App 4 Source: Alex Dobie / Android Central Follow any remaining onscreen instructions .

In your browser, go to play.google.com . Move over to the left navigation bar and click on My Subscriptions . Google Play Web 1 Source: Jeramy Johnson / Android Central Find the subscription you wish to cancel and click on it. Google Play Web 2 Source: Alex Dobie / Android Central Click cancel . Google Play Web 3 Source: Alex Dobie / Android Central Follow any remaining onscreen instructions .
